title: How to calculate the middle of the night? (End time for isha - Islamic Midnight) - Assim al hakeem
transcript: muhammad from the philippines he says can you tell me how to calculate the middle of the night the answer is very easy you take the time of sunset let's assume it is now six o'clock and the time of the break of dawn let's assume it is five o'clock how many hours between 11. what's half of that five and a half add five and a half to the time of sunset which is six the result is 11 30. this is the last time for praying isha this is the islamic midnight it can go down to 11 maybe less it can come up to 12 or 1 depending on the timing between sunset and the break of dawn this is how you calculate it fosan
